alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockingham and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tyngsborough, or near Chelmsford, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nashua, Derry, Salem, Hollis, Hudson, Pelham, Londonderry and Windham. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Western And Central Hillsborough
